name: Throw The Donuts
description:
Who loves donuts? We certainly do, and we show it in this donut throwing game! Throw the donuts to reach one side of the plate to the other. Watch out for other donuts trying to stop you in your path.

• Enjoy fun music
• Yummy graphics and design
• Compete and share with your friends

So go grab some coffee and milk and let's go play a dozen!
